params: An optional base class to inherit from. (Defaults to inheriting from no class)

text: Opens the named file and executes its contents as a Lua chunk. In case of errors, dofile propagates the error to its caller.
params: The name of the file to be loaded.

text: Prints data to the console. This is useful for debugging.
If the game is running with the `-dev` flag, any output will be added to the game logs.
Returns the type of an object as a string. This includes standard Lua types and userdata types specific to this API.
